plot: A middle aged, married man finds that love doesn't always take you to where you think it will when he hears from an old flame. He makes a series of choices that get him out on a limb with his cat, his friends, and his wife.
title: Low Fidelity
plot_es: A middle aged, married man finds that love doesn't always take you to where you think it will when he hears from an old flame. He makes a series of choices that get him out on a limb with his cat, his friends, and his wife.
plot_en: A middle aged, married man finds that love doesn't always take you to where you think it will when he hears from an old flame. He makes a series of choices that get him out on a limb with his cat, his friends, and his wife.
